# Draft:Kingsley Ng (Malaysian actor and model)

----
| birth_place    = Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, Malaysia
| occupation     = Actor, model
| years_active   = 2009–present
| height         = 5 ft 9 in (1.75 m)
| website        = [https://www.instagram.com/kingsley_ng Instagram]
| image          = Kingsley_Ng_in_suit_2025.jpg
| image_size     = 250px
| caption        = Kingsley Ng in 2025
}}
Kingsley Ng (Chinese: 金帝; born 21 October 1991), birth name Ng Kah Hou (Chinese: 吴家豪), is a Malaysian actor, model, and beauty pageant judge. He was born in Kota Kinabalu, Sabah, and has been active in the entertainment industry since 2009, appearing in films, television, variety shows, advertisements, and fashion events.
Early life and career
Ng began his career in 2009 by participating in modeling competitions and fashion-related events. In 2012, he was a finalist in Mister International Malaysia, gaining recognition as a new face in the Malaysian modeling industry.
Television and media appearances
From 2013 to 2016, Ng participated in the outdoor reality show Splash Fiesta (《水舞全城》), broadcast on RTM TV2, where he appeared in various physical challenge segments.
In 2014, he played the male lead in the official music video for Malaysian singer Yu Heng’s (宇珩) song "Fánxīng" (《繁星》).
Other activities
Ng has been invited as a judge and guest mentor at various beauty pageants and youth cultural events.
Awards and recognition
* 2022: International Outstanding Chinese Artist Award, Malaysia Gold Star Awards.
* 2022: Outstanding Chinese Youth Award, Malaysia Gold Star Awards.
* 2022: Emerging Influential Figure of the Year, International Cultural Exchange Association.
